item.title: Building this website with Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description: Partial image credit Why Golang? Static site generators such as Hugo were developed recently using Golang. Golang is a compiled language designed for today’s multi-processor, scalable, high-performance systems. Other platforms have inherited dependency chains that can lead to infeasible build times. Realizing these benefits, Cloudfare recently migrated from Gatsby (a web framework based on JavaScript). Demo website I first created a demo website using the Hugo Winston theme. This theme does have a Live Demo which made it simple to deploy onto Netlify.
